  • Constructor Details

    • SingleRoom

      public SingleRoom(Menu menu, int floor, int num)
      Instantiation of the SingleRoom object this includes details such as the menu available to the room, room floor and room number for the instantiation of the DeluxeRoom object, we have set the max occupancy to 1 (i.e. maximum of 1 guest that can stay in a give Double Room)
      Parameters:
      menu - this is the Menu object containing Food available for the Single room Menu object containing food items available to this Double room for room service;
      floor - this is the room floor, which is required for the instantiation of the SingleRoom object
      num - this is the room number, which is required for the instantiation of the SingleRoom object
